body_html:
@felixgwu at this point both @apaszke and I went through the PR a couple of times, but we are very confused as to what it does. That is why the delay in reviewing.

What do you mean by: "want to minimize padding_shift"?

Also, can you please give an example.

For example, we have an input of 11x11, with kernel of 3x3, okay then what happens with padding/output_padding ?

Also, there is now a merge conflict to be resolved.

body:
@felixgwu at this point both @apaszke and I went through the PR a couple of times, but we are very confused as to what it does. That is why the delay in reviewing.

What do you mean by: "want to minimize padding_shift"?

Also, can you please give an example.

For example, we have an input of 11x11, with kernel of 3x3, okay then what happens with padding/output_padding ?

Also, there is now a merge conflict to be resolved.
